app.name: Char
app.one_liner: An AI notepad for private meetings that listens to audio and generates summaries based on user memos.

core_loop: User jots down important notes during a meeting while Char listens to audio input/output from the computer; after the meeting, Char crafts a summary based on the user's memos and the transcribed audio.

screens.name: Main Notepad
screens.purpose: Allows users to take notes during meetings while Char captures audio in the background.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist a memo or note item to local storage.

mvp_plan: week 1: Set up Tauri + Rust backend
acceptance_tests: User can open the app and start taking notes during a simulated meeting.
After ending a session, a summary is generated using local LLM (e.g., Ollama).
open_questions: How to handle offline transcription without cloud services?
What local LLMs are officially supported?
